description: It is incredible what can be achieved in a year with perseverance and dedication. So this year I have proposed:

2023.text: Take and pass the Java OCA and OCP exam
Improve my English and certify myself at a C1 level or higher
Study and obtain the certificate of AWS Cloud Practitioner and AWS Developer Associate
Learn and understand the docker environment and networks
